precedents.title: Aggressive Marketing vs. Commandment X
precedents.scenario: Marketing proposed a campaign targeting a competitor's failures directly.
precedents.ruling: REJECTED. Violation of Commandment X (Covetousness). We win by merit, not by tearing others down. Focus on our own value proposition.

precedents.title: Data Deletion vs. Commandment IX
precedents.scenario: An engineer attempted to delete logs of a failed deployment to clean up the dashboard.
precedents.ruling: REJECTED. Violation of Commandment IX (False Witness). History must be preserved. Use filters to hide noise, do not destroy truth.

precedents.title: Server Shutdown vs. Commandment VI
precedents.scenario: Green Ops scheduler shut down the Device Lab while a test was running.
precedents.ruling: ALLOWED with modification. Commandment VI (Do not kill) applies to *critical* processes. Test environments are ephemeral. Added 'drain_time' to the scheduler.
